objects.text: • Premium Transparent Design • Digital LED Display • Wireless Bluetooth

product_details.name: Crystal Clear Transparent Wireless Earbuds with LED Display
product_details.description:
• Premium transparent design showcasing internal technology
• Digital LED display showing battery level and connection status
• Stylish purple LED backlight illumination
• Left/Right channel indicators for easy identification
• Clear charging case with modern technological aesthetic
• Wireless Bluetooth connectivity
• Digital battery percentage indicator
• High-tech transparent casing reveals premium craftsmanship
• Ergonomic earbud design for comfortable fit
• Modern segment display for clear status readings
• Durable transparent shell protection
• Sleek and futuristic see-through design

banner_details:
This banner promotes a pair of wireless earbuds using a futuristic and high-tech aesthetic. The background features a dark radial gradient (from deep purple to midnight black) with abstract lines and soft circular strokes that add tech-inspired ambience. The headline text layer ("heading") stands bold and large at the top, using a modern, tech-style font in white to clearly communicate the product's branding. Below it, the "subheading" layer offers a secondary product descriptor in a subdued light grey. At the center, the "product_image" of the transparent earbuds sits within a soft white circular frame, enhanced with a partial dashed border. On the right, a glowing purple circular badge holds the "price" text layer in a striking white futuristic font. Near the bottom, the "description" layer summarizes product highlights as bullet points in soft grey. A strong rectangle button ("cta_button") in vibrant purple anchors the banner, with the "cta" text layer inviting action in bold white font.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Purple: #1A0F33  
- Midnight Black: #0D071A  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Cool Grey: #E0E0E0  
- Price Gradient: #C061E6 to #8E32AD  
- CTA Button: #8E32AD  
- Description Grey: #D1D1D1
product_color: The product image showcases a high-tech, futuristic design with a sleek and modern aesthetic. Dominant colors include deep black (#000000), cool gray (#A9A9A9), transparent silver (#DCDCDC), vibrant electric blue (#3F00FF), and white (#FFFFFF) for LED indicators. The black and gray provide a strong, premium base, while the electric blue accents highlight key functional areas, drawing attention with a neon glow effect. The transparent casing merges the colors visually, creating smooth transitions and revealing internal components, adding depth. The white LED digits contrast sharply against the dark display, enhancing readability. This color palette is ideal for a tech-centric advertisement campaign.
